maqras.text: That is because God makes the night to enter into the day and He makes the day to enter into the night and God is certainly Hearing, Seeing
That is because God is the Reality and that which they call upon besides Him, that is falsehood and because God, He is the High, the Great
Did you not see that God sends down water from the sky so the earth becomes green? God is certainly Subtilely Informed
Whatever is in the skies and whatever is in the earth is His, and God is certainly the Independent, the Praised

Did you not consider that God has subjected to your service that which is in the earth, and the ships sailing in the sea by His command, and He withholds the sky from falling on the earth, (the sky cannot fall down) without His permission? God is certainly full of pity and Merciful to mankind
And He it is Who gave you life, then He will cause you to die, then He will (again) make you alive. Man is certainly ungrateful

For every community We have appointed devotional rites which they are toper form, so let them not dispute with you about the affair, and invite (them) towards your Lord, you are certainly on right guidance
And if they dispute with you then say, "God knows best about that which you all do
God will judge between you on the day of resurrection concerning that wherein you used to differ
Did you not know that God knows that which is in the sky and the earth, that is certainly in a record, that is certainly easy for God
And they serve (worship) besides God, that for which He has not sent down any authority, and that about which they have no knowledge. And for those who are unjust there will be no helpers

And when Our clear signs are read to them you can recognize rejection in the faces of those who do not believe, (as if) they are about to attack those who read Our signs to them. Say, "Shall I inform you of (something) worse than that? The fire ! God has promised it for those who do not believe, and it is an evil destination

O mankind ! a similitude is set forth, so listen to it: those whom you pray to, besides God, certainly cannot create a fly (even) if they all get together for it, and if the fly snatches away something from them they cannot (even) take it back from it, weak are the seeker and the sought
They have not estimated God with the estimation that is due to Him, God is certainly Strong, Mighty
God chooses messengers from among the angels and (also) from among mankind, God is certainly Hearing, Seeing
He knows that which is before them and that which is behind them, and all affairs are returned to God
O you who believe ! bow down and prostrate and serve (worship) your Lord and do good that you may be successful

And strive in (the cause of) God with the striving that is due to His (cause). He has chosen you and He has not made any difficulty for you in religion, the religious dictates of your father Abraham, He had named you Muslims before and in this (too), that the messenger may be a witness over you ( by keeping an eye on you all) and you may be witnesses over mankind (by keeping an eye on them). So establish worship (salat) and give charity (zakat) and hold fast to God. He is your Guardian and an Excellent Guardian and Excellent Helper
